SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC) AS ROWNUM, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NM, PHOTO_GFILE_ID, SPEC_GFILE_ID, '미진행' AS MASTER_APPLY_NM, '보통' AS SELF_EVL_GRAD_NM FROM T1_PRODUCT
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NM DESC, ROWNUM
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1_PRODUCT WHERE upper(PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT a.PRODUCT_CODE , a.PRODUCT_NM , a.SUPPLIER_INFO , a.PRODUCT_MAKER , a.SUMMARY , a.PHOTO_GFILE_ID , a.SPEC_GFILE_ID , a.MASTER_APPLY_CODE , a.RECEIPT_NO , a.APPROVAL_NO
, a.MASTER_MAPPING_CODE , a.MAPPING_PRODUCT_CODE , b.PRODUCT_NM MAPPING_PRODUCT_NM
, a.RGST_ID , a.RGST_DT , a.MODI_ID , a.MODI_DT FROM T1_PRODUCT a LEFT OUTER JOIN T1_PRODUCT b ON upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(b.MAPPING_PRODUCT_CODE) AND b.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE T1_PRODUCT SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PACKAGING_ORDER, MAT_TYPE FROM t_product_packaging WHERE upper(PRODUCT_ID) = upper(#{productId}) AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY PACKAGING_ORDER

SELECT a.PACKAGING_ID , a.PRODUCT_CODE , b.PRODUCT_NM , a.PACKAGING_ORDER , a.MAT_LCLS_CODE , a.MAT_MCLS_CODE , a.USE_YN , a.RGST_ID , a.RGST_DT , a.MODI_ID , a.MODI_DT FROM t_product_packaging a LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PRODUCT b ON upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND b.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE upper(a.PRODUCT_CODE) = upper(#{productCode}) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'
and (a.PACKAGING_ORDER = #{packagingOrder})
and (a.PACKAGING_ID = #{packagingId})

SELECT a.PACKAGING_DETAIL_ID , a.PACKING_ID , a.PART_CODE , a.MAT_INFO , a.WEIGHT , a.STANDARD , a.COLOR , a.SUMMARY , a.MAT_FILE_ID , a.SUPPLIER_CODE , a.MANAGER_ID , a.USE_YN , a.RGST_ID , a.RGST_DT , a.MODI_ID , a.MODI_DT FROM t_product_packaging a WHERE a.PACKING_ID = upper(#{PACKING_ID}) AND a.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT a.PRODUCT_CODE , a.APPROVAL_NUMBER , b.MAT_TYPE FROM t_product a , t_product_packaging b WHERE a.USE_YN ='Y' AND b.USE_YN ='Y' AND a.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID AND b.PACKAGING_ORDER = 1 AND a.MASTER_APPLY = 'COMPLETION' AND ifnull(a.APPROVAL_NUMBER,'') <> '' AND a.MASTER_MAPPING = 'UNMAPPING' AND b.MAT_TYPE = #{matType}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.CODE_ID FROM t_product_packaging_mat a LEFT JOIN t_product_packaging_mat b ON a.CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND b.file is null AND b.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} WHERE b.CODE_ID IS NULL AND a.file is null AND a.PRODUCT_ID = #{mappingProductId} UNION SELECT DISTINCT a.CODE_ID FROM t_product_packaging_mat a LEFT JOIN t_product_packaging_mat b ON a.CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND b.file is null AND b.PRODUCT_ID = #{mappingProductId} WHERE b.CODE_ID IS NULL AND a.file is null AND a.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} ) c
SELECT concat(a.code_nm,'-', b.code_nm) AS codeNm , b.code_id AS codeId FROM t_environ_price a, t_environ_price b WHERE a.code_id = b.group_id
SELECT BASE_YEAR , ACCUMULATE_SALE_QTY , PACKING_TOTAL_WEIGHT , RECYLE_CONTRIBUTIONS FROM T_PRODUCT_RECYLE_CONTRIBUTIONS WHERE upper(PRODUCT_ID) = upper(#{productId}) AND BASE_YEAR = #{inBaseYear}
SELECT ifnull(max(packaging_order), 0) packaging_order FROM T_PRODUCT_PACKAGING WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND product_id = #{productId} AND packaging_order < 9
SELECT ifnull(max(packaging_order), 8) packaging_order FROM T_PRODUCT_PACKAGING WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND product_id = #{productId} AND packaging_order >= 9

SELECT a.PACKAGING_ID , a.PRODUCT_ID , b.PRODUCT_NM , a.PACKAGING_NM , a.PACKAGING_DSC , a.PACKAGING_ORDER , a.MAT_TYPE , a.PART_TYPE , a.PART_TYPE_ORDER , a.MAT_INFO , a.WEIGHT , a.STANDARD , a.COLOR , a.ADD_EXPLAN , a.MAT_FILE_ID , a.SUPPLIER_CODE , a.MANAGER_ID FROM T_PRODUCT_PACKAGING a LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PRODUCT b ON a.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID AND b.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE a.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT a.PACKAGING_ID , a.PRODUCT_ID , a.PACKAGING_NM , a.PACKAGING_DSC , a.PACKAGING_ORDER , a.MAT_TYPE , a.PART_TYPE , a.PART_TYPE_ORDER , a.MAT_INFO , a.WEIGHT , a.STANDARD , a.COLOR , a.ADD_EXPLAN , a.MAT_FILE_ID , a.SUPPLIER_CODE , a.MANAGER_ID FROM T_PRODUCT_PACKAGING a WHERE a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND a.PACKAGING_ORDER = 1
SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM T_PRODUCT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}
SELECT PRODUCT_NM FROM T_PRODUCT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

, GROUP_ID , CODE_ID , REVISION_YEAR , REVISION_MONTH , USE_YN , RGST_ID , RGST_DT , MODI_ID , MODI_DT FROM t_product_packaging_mat WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND PACKAGING_ORDER = #{packagingOrder} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
